document_data.name: Roldo
document_data.Relationships: The name of Roldo was known to at least one guard at the House of the Ladystar.
document_data.History: In the {{yearlinkName|767}}, two [[tenday]]s into the Chaos of [[the Art]] of that year, Roldo was part of a mob that attempted to storm the gates of the House of the Ladystar. While pushing at the gates, Roldo declared that if the guards cast a spell, they'd leave; one of the guards responded to him by name, telling Roldo that guards didn't cast spells.
